belongs_to_collection.name: Cocky Boys' A Man and His Boy Collection

overview: What is about svelte boys that guys can't get enough of? Nico Leon and Sharok portray the powerful energy between a man pleasing his boy. Avery Jones, Aiden Ward, and Benjamin Blue ride Tayte Hanson, Manuel Skye, and Austin Wolf - showcasing exactly how A Man and His Boy get their cocks and holes satisfied.
title: A Man and His Boy 4
